channel.title: Help Needed over here
channel.description:
Well . I need a little help with my 508 client ..
I cant run it properly . Okay , this is what i tried .
I DLed 508 client , extracted it to the Desktop. Then , i opened the folder and edited the "build.bat" file , to my java version . And then i hit run and it asks for ip address . I type the right IP of the server where to i want to go and it and it stops at text "Connecting to update server" etc . Please help me anyone ..
Thanks , By LegendPkz
